metadata.name: Location Generator
metadata.description: Generates descriptions for new locations in the world
metadata.author: system

template:
Generate a [terrain_type] location connected to [existing_location].

Consider:
- faction_control=[faction]
- climate=[season]
- political_tension=[current_events]

Include:
- 2-3 exits with semantic descriptions
- Ambient details appropriate to terrain and climate
- Potential encounters or points of interest

Maintain:
- Established lore consistency
- D&D mechanics integration
- Immersive narrative voice

variables.name: terrain_type
variables.description: Type of terrain (e.g., forest, mountain, urban)

variables.name: existing_location
variables.description: Name or description of the connected location

variables.name: current_events
variables.description: Relevant world events or political situation

examples.description: Generate a forest location near a village in autumn
